definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

pinyin: Shi1 hua2 luo4 shi4 qi2 shui3 jing1

definition: citrine (orange or yellow quartz SiO2 as a semiprecious stone)

sentences.english: Short dangling chains shine with multi-coloured bezel-set crystals.
sentences.chinese: 懸掛着的短飾鏈配上富多種顏色的包邊鑲嵌水晶。

sentences.english: Slipper dream compared to the people, Kate has overturned that idea.
sentences.chinese: 相比人們的水晶鞋夢，凱特卻顛覆了這種觀念。

sentences.english: Crystal base, foil glittering and translucent get rid of whole product extremely smart showily.
sentences.chinese: 水晶底座晶瑩剔透，烘托整個產品極其醒目華貴。

sentences.english: It attracted many thousands of visitors from all levels of society.
sentences.chinese: 水晶宮曾吸收了社會各階級的瞻仰者駐足欣賞。

sentences.english: Most of the world's topaz is white or blue.
sentences.chinese: 世界上大多數之黃水晶是白色或藍色之。

sentences.english: The disease has affected the lens of his left eye.
sentences.chinese: 這種病已經影響了他左眼的水晶體。

sentences.english: Her last chance at winning any necklace is Amethyst.
sentences.chinese: 她唯一有機會能贏下的是紫水晶項鍊。

sentences.english: It's cheap to make too, something like a crystal vial and two ragveil.
sentences.chinese: 同時，它非常便宜，一個水晶瓶和兩個拉格維花就行。

sentences.english: I want an amethyst ring, but I do not know what my ring size is.
sentences.chinese: 我要一隻紫水晶戒指，但是我不知道我的戒指尺碼。

sentences.english: Among the endless icy mountains is Ilum's Crystal Cave.
sentences.chinese: 在無邊無際的冰封山脈中有伊冷的水晶洞。

sentences.english: Indigo glazing through the last crystal glazed processing screen.
sentences.chinese: 通過靛藍上釉，最後水晶釉面處理畫面。

sentences.english: The lights in the ladies' toilets are crystal extravaganzas.
sentences.chinese: 女洗手間裏的燈光閃着水晶的光芒。

sentences.english: And beyond that, swap them for White Jars when you're doing Light Crystal recipes.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，他們掉白水晶瓶子當你做輕食譜。

sentences.english: It is also known as "Rock Crystal".
Frost consists of tiny crystals of ice which grow outward from a solid surface.
sentences.chinese: 霜包括從堅實表面增長向外冰的微小的水晶。

sentences.english: The condom is the glass slipper of our generation.
sentences.chinese: 避孕套是我們這代的水晶鞋。

definition: person/number of people/(per) capita/(a person's) head/(Tw) person whose identity is used by sb else (e.g. to create a bogus account)
